description.para: This controls whether the client is allowed or required to use SMB signing. Possible values are auto, mandatory and disabled.
When set to auto or default, SMB signing is offered, but not enforced.
When set to mandatory, SMB signing is required and if set to disabled, SMB signing is not offered either.
IPC$ connections for DCERPC e.g. in winbindd, are handled by the option.
